zh: 塞尚以他的风景画闻名。

en: Sexual harassment has now become a social issue.
zh: 性骚扰现在已经成了一个社会问题。

en: I have a chest cold.
zh: 我感冒了，胸口难受。

en: Do you have cough drops?
zh: 你有止咳糖吗？

en: I have a cough.
zh: 我有点咳嗽。

en: I can't stop coughing.
zh: 我咳个不停。

en: I had a bad cough, so I took the bitter medicine.
zh: 我咳得厉害，所以喝了那种苦药。

en: I don't want to rush you, but let's try to catch the next bus.
zh: 我不想催你，但咱们尽量赶下一班车吧。

en: When I was in Salem, I would often play tennis with John.
zh: 我在塞勒姆的时候，经常和约翰一起打网球。

en: The salesman talked my parents into buying a set of encyclopedias.
zh: 那个推销员说服我父母买了一套百科全书。

en: Salesmen are usually fast talkers.
zh: 搞推销的人嘴皮子通常都很利索。

en: The salesman demonstrated how to use the mincer.
zh: 推销员演示了绞肉机的使用方法。

en: The salesman sold the article at an unreasonable price.
zh: 那个推销员以不合理的高价卖掉了那个东西。

en: The salesman demonstrated how to use it.
zh: 推销员演示了怎么用。

en: I'd like to use a safe.
zh: 我想用一下保险柜。

en: The salesman demonstrated how to use the machine.
zh: 推销员演示了这台机器怎么操作。

en: Would you put this in the safety deposit box?
zh: 能帮我把这个存进保管箱吗？

en: The Seine flows through Paris.
zh: 塞纳河穿过巴黎。

en: We have safety deposit boxes.
zh: 我们这儿有保管箱。

en: You're wearing your sweater inside out.
zh: 你毛衣穿反了。

en: On an island in the Seine, there is a big church called Notre Dame.
zh: 在塞纳河的一个岛上，有一座叫巴黎圣母院的大教堂。

en: I think I had better have my sweater mended.
zh: 我觉得我最好把毛衣补一下。

en: Put on your sweater. Otherwise you will catch cold.
zh: 把毛衣穿上，不然会感冒的。

en: I caught my sweater on that nail.
zh: 我的毛衣被那个钉子勾住了。

en: The sweater shrank in the wash.
zh: 毛衣洗缩水了。

en: What shall I put on over my sweater?
zh: 我毛衣外面该穿点什么呢？

en: The sleeves of the sweater began to unravel.
zh: 毛衣的袖子开始脱线了。

en: I'm looking for a sweater.
zh: 我想买件毛衣。

en: My sweater shrank in the wash.
zh: 我的毛衣洗缩水了。

en: You should make the most of your ability.
zh: 你应该充分发挥你的能力。

en: Not more than 40 percent of students go on university.
zh: 上大学的学生不超过百分之四十。

en: At most 40 percent of students go on to university.
zh: 最多只有百分之四十的学生会上大学。

en: Seiko has no sisters.
zh: 圣子没有姐妹。

en: Only twenty people will come to the party at best.
zh: 派对最多也就来二十个人。

en: After a hearty dinner, Willie thanked the host.
zh: 吃了一顿丰盛的晚餐后，威利向主人道了谢。

en: She's a wonderful wife and mother.
zh: 她是个非常棒的妻子和母亲。

en: Ms. Swan is our English teacher.
zh: 斯旺女士是我们的英语老师。

en: The Swallows are behind 2 to 1!
zh: 燕子队一比二落后！

en: The Swallows are ahead 4 to 1!
zh: 燕子队四比一领先！

en: When is the next train to Sloane Square?
zh: 下一趟去斯隆广场的火车是什么时候？

en: The grass was left long and weedy in the slate walk, and very often he wasn't cutting the grass on the other side of the hedge by the road at all.
zh: 石板路上的草长得老长，满是杂草，而且他经常根本不修剪路边树篱另一侧的草。

en: It's fun to play, too.
zh: 玩这个也挺有意思的。

en: Then the monkey went round with a little tin cup.
zh: 然后那只猴子带着个小锡杯转了一圈。

en: Then you will be happy.
zh: 那样你就会开心了。

en: The dean sighed and said: "I think that this woman is perhaps... my own cousin".
zh: 院长叹了口气说：“我觉得这个女人也许是……我自己的表妹。”

en: Along comes the grandmother and sees her granddaughter.
zh: 奶奶走过来，看到了她的孙女。

en: Dear woman, why do you involve me? Jesus replied.
zh: “妇人，为什么要牵连我呢？”耶稣回答道。

en: Then you will have money and you will be happy.
zh: 那样你就有钱了，也会开心了。

en: There is nothing to do, so I may as well go to bed.
zh: 反正也没事可做，我还是去睡觉吧。

en: Better wear out shoes than sheets.
zh: 宁愿把鞋穿烂，也不要把床单躺烂。

en: They do it just for the thrill of it.
zh: 他们这么做纯粹是为了追求刺激。

en: The thrilling video game took all my attention.
zh: 那个刺激的游戏把我的注意力全吸走了。

en: A man called Slim was killed in the accident.
zh: 一个叫斯利姆的男人在事故中丧生了。

en: The pickpocket disappeared into the crowd.
zh: 那个扒手钻进人群不见了。

en: One of the pickpockets blew the whistle on the other two.
zh: 其中一个扒手把另外两个给揭发了。

en: Be on your guard against pickpockets.
zh: 留心扒手。

en: Beware of pickpockets.
zh: 当心小偷。

en: I'd like to report a theft.
zh: 我想报个案，我东西被偷了。

en: Please put on your slippers.
zh: 请换上拖鞋。

en: You're not supposed to wear your slippers down to the lobby.
zh: 你不该穿着拖鞋去大堂。

en: Measurements are different from individual to individual.
zh: 尺寸因人而异。

en: Memorize this paragraph until you can say it fluently.
zh: 把这段背下来，直到能流利地说出来为止。

en: Smog causes plants to die.
zh: 雾霾会导致植物死亡。

en: Smog is the enemy of healthy lungs.
zh: 雾霾是肺部健康的杀手。

en: Smog hung over Tokyo.
zh: 东京上空笼罩着雾霾。

en: Excuse me, but where is the men's shoe department?
zh: 请问男鞋专柜在哪儿？

en: May I trouble you for a light?
zh: 麻烦借个火？

en: I'm sorry, I dropped my knife.
zh: 抱歉，我刀掉地上了。

en: Excuse me, but would you please tell me the way to the post office?
zh: 麻烦问一下，去邮局怎么走？

en: Please give her a fluoride treatment.
zh: 请给她做一下涂氟治疗。

en: Please answer the phone.
zh: 请接一下电话。

en: I'm afraid you can't.
zh: 恐怕不行。

en: Will you please put the baby to bed?
zh: 能麻烦你把宝宝抱去睡觉吗？

en: May I trouble you to pass me the pepper?
zh: 麻烦把胡椒粉递给我一下？

en: I'm sorry, but I don't have any small change.
zh: 抱歉，我没有零钱。

en: I'm sorry, but they're out of stock.
zh: 不好意思，缺货了。

en: I'm sorry, but I don't understand English well.
zh: 抱歉，我英语不太好。

en: May I trouble you for the sugar?
zh: 麻烦把糖递给我一下？

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the station?
zh: 请问，去车站怎么走？

en: Would you mind turning down the radio?
zh: 能把收音机声音关小点吗？

en: Would you kindly switch off the radio?
zh: 麻烦关一下收音机好吗？

en: Would you kindly make room for this old woman?
zh: 麻烦给这位老太太让个位置？

en: May I trouble you for the pepper?
zh: 麻烦把胡椒粉递给我。
